thread.title: Jenna
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Jenna

author: Jenna
title: Jenna
text: I have been wanting to try BBG for quite some time, but was hesitant to spend the money on it. I stumbled upon this website and it was just the push I needed to try it out. Within seconds of clicking purchase I received an email as well as being able to download the PDF's on the confirmation page. Very excited to try it out!
